img_text: DIANE ABBOTT Would-be Home Secretary Every defeat of the British state is a victory for all of us' OPENLY BACKING IRA MURDERS IN 1984 'We call for the abolition of conspirational groups like MI5 & Special Branch PARLIAMENTARY MOTION SHE SIGNED IN 1989 'I deemed them to be dissidents rather than terrorist organisations" IN 2017, ON HER 1999 VOTE AGAINST BANNING TERROR GROUPS INCLUDING AL-QAEDA
